name: com.unity.mobile.notifications
description:
Mobile Notifications package adds support for scheduling local repeatable or one-time notifications on iOS and Android.

On iOS receiving of push notifications is also supported.

_upm.changelog:
### Changes & Improvements:
- [iOS] iOSNotificationCenter.OpenNotificationSettings now directly opens the notification settings page for your app on iOS 15.4 and later.

### Fixes:
- [iOS] Fixed push notifications not being ignored by the package when they are disabled in settings.
